single_crochet in each stitch around 6 stuff lightly eyes make two of these 6 single_crochet in mc join with st push to flatten add black dots on the outsides tie loose ends of black yarn in the back and cut short enough to hide behind the eye careful when tying here as tying it too tight will cause the dot to disappear i used a loose knot and then double knotted it tightly after that sewing sew eyes on with 3 stitches between them carefully tuck the ends of the black yarn behind as you are sewing you may need to poke the ends of the black yarn with a yarn needle to get it to stop showing sew the arms to the sides just under the neck they will stick out after you have sewn them on use another piece of yarn to tie them down to the sides i used the same piece of yarn for both arms so they re also tied down to each other sew the ears on top of the head embroider the mouth on to the face
